attributes.action: It’s time the Government admitted the Brexit referendum was “advisory”
attributes.background:
The European “referendum” would have been declared as void had it not been “advisory”. 

It’s time for the British government to admit this in parliament and stop saying that it is the “will of the people”

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition calling on the House of Commons to vote on a motion acknowledging that the 2016 referendum was advisory if that's something you would like to see happen.
